item.title: 病毒式点击刺激消费热潮，Roblox 上调年度预订预期
item.description: 周四，Roblox 上调了对年度预订的预期，其电子游戏平台的日活跃用户数量也突破了 1 亿，这得益于 "种植花园 "等病毒性热门游戏的成功，使其股价在收盘前上涨了 12.4%。【原文：Roblox raised its forecast for annual bookings on Thursday and crossed 100 million in daily active users on its videogame platform, riding on the success of viral hits such as "Grow a Garden" and sending its shares up 12.4% before the bell.】

item.title: 艾伯维上调年度盈利预期，因新型免疫学药物需求强劲
item.description: 艾伯维周四上调了 2025 年的利润预期，此前由于较新的免疫学药物 Skyrizi 和 Rinvoq 销售强劲，其第二季度业绩超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：AbbVie raised its 2025 profit forecast on Thursday, after beating Wall Street estimates for second-quarter results on strong sales of its newer immunology drugs Skyrizi and Rinvoq.】

item.title: 受运营和维护成本上升影响，PG&E利润不及预期
item.description: 周四，PG&E 公司第二季度利润略低于华尔街预期，该公用事业公司受到运营和维护成本增加的打击，股价在盘前交易中下跌 1.4%。【原文：PG&E Corp on Thursday narrowly missed Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit, as the utility firm was hit by an increase in operating and maintenance costs, sending its shares down 1.4% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 纽约证交所母公司 ICE 利润大增，波动性推动收入创历史新高
item.description: 洲际交易所周四公布第二季度利润增长，原因是其能源业务的强劲交易量推动了创纪录的收入。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange reported a higher second-quarter profit on Thursday, as strong trading volumes in its energy business drove record revenue.】

item.title: 意大利反对党警告不要让 SpaceX 参与卫星更新
item.description: 议会文件显示，意大利主要反对党民主党（PD）警告乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）领导的执政联盟不要让埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司参与卫星项目的更新，称此举将带来国家安全风险。【原文：Italy's main opposition Democratic Party (PD) has warned Giorgia Meloni's ruling coalition against involving Elon Musk's SpaceX in the update of a satellite programme, parliamentary documents show, saying the move would pose national security risks.】

item.title: 据 NHK 报道，日本赤泽称美国汽车关税削减可能需要时间
item.description: 据日本公共广播公司（NHK）周四报道，日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世表示，美国可能需要一段时间才能将汽车关税降至15%。【原文：Japan's top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa said it might take some time for U.S. tariffs on automobiles to be lowered to 15%, public broadcaster NHK reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 南非准备在最后一刻提出贸易提议以避免美国加征关税
item.description: 南非贸易部长周四表示，在美国官员的敦促下，南非正准备在最后一刻提出一项 "增强型 "贸易提案，希望避免美国在周五开始对南非征收 30% 的关税。【原文：South Africa is preparing a last-minute "enhanced" trade proposal at the urging of U.S. officials in hopes of avoiding a 30% tariff which kicks in on Friday, its trade minister said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普在维持利率不变后再次抨击美联储主席鲍威尔
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四再次批评美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell），一天前美国央行以9:2的投票结果维持利率稳定。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump again criticised Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell on Thursday, a day after the U.S. central bank held interest rates steady in a 9-2 vote.】

item.title: 史诗级 "业绩增长推动康卡斯特季度业绩增长
item.description: 受《史诗宇宙》（Epic Universe）五月首映引发的主题公园入园人数激增、国内无线业务增长以及流媒体收入飙升的推动，康卡斯特周四公布的季度收入和利润均超过预期。【原文：Comcast topped estimates for quarterly revenue and profit on Thursday, driven by a surge in theme park attendance sparked by the May debut of "Epic Universe", growth in its domestic wireless business and a spike in streaming revenue.】

item.title: 美国对印度 "令人讨厌 "的非货币贸易壁垒的主要抱怨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三宣布从8月1日起对印度商品征收25%的关税，并对俄罗斯的石油采购实施额外惩罚，他还批评新德里 "强硬而令人讨厌 "的非货币贸易壁垒。特朗普随后表示谈判仍在继续。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday slapped 25% tariffs on Indian goods starting Aug. 1, with an additional penalty on Russian oil purchases, and he criticized New Delhi for its "strenuous and obnoxious" non-monetary trade barriers. Trump said later negotiations were continuing.】

item.title: 关税不确定性和欧佩克+供应增加对油价构成压力：路透调查
item.description: 路透社周四的一项民意调查显示，由于欧佩克+产量增加和美国关税的不确定性对市场构成压力，分析师们对2025年的油价预测基本保持不变。【原文：Analysts are keeping their oil price forecasts mostly unchanged for 2025, as a rise in OPEC+ output and ongoing U.S. tariff uncertainty weigh on the market, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 百时美施贵宝第二季度业绩好于预期，主要得益于畅销产品的强劲表现
item.description: 布里斯托尔-迈尔斯-施贵宝公司周三公布的第二季度业绩大大好于预期，因为其最成熟、最畅销的品牌--血液稀释剂 Eliquis 和癌症治疗药物 Opdivo 和 Revlimid--销售强劲。【原文：Bristol Myers Squibb posted much better-than-expected second-quarter results on Wednesday on strong sales of its most established and best-selling brands, blood thinner Eliquis and cancer treatments Opdivo and Revlimid.】

item.title: KKR 第二季度利润因收费收入增长而上升
item.description: 投资巨头 KKR 周四公布，第二季度调整后净收入增长 9%，主要得益于与费用相关的收益增长。【原文：Investment giant KKR reported a 9% rise in adjusted net income for the second quarter on Thursday, bolstered by an increase in fee-related earnings.】

item.title: 法拉利第二季度核心利润增长 6%，豪华车制造商关税影响减少
item.description: 豪华跑车制造商法拉利（Ferrari）周四表示，在强大的定价能力和更丰富的产品的支持下，该公司第二季度的核心盈利增长了6%，同时美国对欧盟生产的产品征收新关税的影响也有所减弱。【原文：Luxury sports-car maker Ferrari said on Thursday its core earnings rose 6% in the second quarter, supported by strong pricing power and richer product offerings, while seeing a reduced impacts from new U.S. tariffs on EU-made products.】

item.title: 奢侈风雪衣制造商加拿大鹅季度亏损超预期
item.description: 加拿大鹅公司周四公布的亏损额大于预期，原因是在设计、销售和营销其奢侈产品（如夹克和连帽衫）方面的投资支出不断增加，导致利润率下降。【原文：Canada Goose , posted a bigger-than-expected loss on Thursday, as increasing expenses related to investments in designing, merchandising and marketing of its luxury products such as puffer jackets and hoodies, dented margins.】

item.title: 消息人士称，巴西35.9%的对美出口面临更高的关税
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，根据特朗普政府周三发布的行政命令，巴西估计其35.9%的对美出口商品（按价值计算）将被征收50%的高额关税。【原文：Brazil estimates that 35.9% of its exports to the United States, by value, will be hit by a steep 50% tariff under an executive order issued on Wednesday by the Trump administration, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: Figma 将首次亮相，美国首次公开募股大获成功，重燃复兴希望
item.description: 设计软件公司 Figma 在美国上市募集了 12.2 亿美元的资金，将于周四晚些时候开始交易，这为高增长科技公司的纷纷上市创造了条件，并加强了 IPO 市场的反弹。【原文：Design software firm Figma will begin trading later on Thursday after raising $1.22 billion in a blowout U.S. float, setting the stage for a flurry of high-growth tech listings and strengthening a rebound in the IPO market.】

item.title: 早间竞价：大型企业蓬勃发展，美元飙升降温
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 庞巴迪季度收入下降而利润上升
item.description: 公务机制造商庞巴迪公司周四公布的第二季度财报显示，由于飞机交付量和订单量增加，以及零部件和维修需求强劲，该公司第二季度收入略有下降，但净利润超出分析师预期。【原文：Business jet maker Bombardier's reported second-quarter revenue on Thursday that was down slightly, though net income beat analysts' expectations, driven by higher airplane deliveries and orders, and strong demand for parts and repairs.】

item.title: 由于炼油利润率提高，HF Sinclair 第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: 受炼油利润率上升的帮助，炼油商 HF Sinclair 周四公布的第二季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Refiner HF Sinclair beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by higher refining margins.】

item.title: CVS 第二季度利润超预期，得益于医疗成本控制
item.description: 周四，CVS Health 的第二季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是对较高医疗成本的严格监管使其 Aetna 健康保险业务的业绩有所改善。【原文：CVS Health beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, as tight oversight of higher medical costs led to improved performance for its Aetna health insurance business.】

item.title: Meta、微软业绩受人工智能提振，华尔街期货创历史新高
item.description: 在科技巨头 Meta 和微软的强劲财报增强了投资者对人工智能投资正在获得回报的信心之后，与 S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数挂钩的期货周四飙升至历史新高。【原文：Futures tied to the S&P 500 and Nasdaq surged to record highs on Thursday after strong earnings from tech giants Meta and Microsoft reinforced investor confidence that artificial intelligence investments are paying off.】

item.title: 印度在线外卖平台 Swiggy 因支出增加而扩大季度亏损
item.description: 印度在线外卖平台 Swiggy 周四公布的季度亏损扩大，原因是对其快速电子商务部门 Instamart 的投资不断增加。【原文：Indian online delivery platform Swiggy posted a wider quarterly loss on Thursday, as rising investments in its quick-commerce arm, Instamart, continued to weigh.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称印度国有炼油厂暂停购买俄罗斯石油
item.description: 行业消息人士称，由于本月折扣缩小以及美国总统唐纳德-特朗普警告不要从莫斯科购买石油，印度国营炼油厂在过去一周已停止购买俄罗斯石油。【原文：Indian state refiners have stopped buying Russian oil in the past week as discounts narrowed this month and U.S. President Donald Trump warned against purchasing oil from Moscow, industry sources said.】

item.title: 因罕见病药物需求强劲，百健上调年度盈利预期
item.description: 百健公司（Biogen）周四上调了年度利润预期，该公司寄希望于对 Skyclarys 等罕见病药物的强劲需求，以抵消老款多发性硬化症药物销售额的下滑。【原文：Biogen raised its annual profit forecast on Thursday, betting on strong demand for its rare disease drugs such as Skyclarys to offset declining sales of its older multiple sclerosis drugs.】

item.title: 韩国、巴西和印度的主要关税计划
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，美国将对从韩国进口的商品征收15%的关税，这是他在8月1日征税最后期限之前宣布的一系列此类措施之一。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said the U.S. would charge a 15% tariff on imports from South Korea, one of a number of such measures announced in the run-up to his August 1 deadline to impose such levies.】

item.title: 医疗服务增长强劲，Cigna 盈利超出预期
item.description: 受药房福利管理业务强劲的帮助，Cigna 周四公布的第二季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：Cigna beat Wall Street estimate for second-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by strength in its pharmacy benefit management business.】

item.title: 英国称亚马逊和微软在云计算领域的主导地位损害了竞争
item.description: 英国反垄断监管机构的一个调查小组称，亚马逊和微软在云计算领域的主导地位正在对竞争产生不利影响，而技术和商业转换障碍又加剧了这种影响。【原文：Amazon and Microsoft's dominant position in cloud computing is having an adverse effect on competition, exacerbated by technical and commercial barriers to switching, an inquiry group from Britain's antitrust regulator said.】

item.title: 人工智能基础设施公司 fal 融资 1.25 亿美元，公司估值达 15 亿美元
item.description: 人工智能基础设施公司 fal 周四表示，公司已完成 1.25 亿美元的 C 轮融资，估值达 15 亿美元。【原文：Artificial intelligence infrastructure company fal raised a $125 million Series C round valuing the company at $1.5 billion, the company said Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普关税在美国上诉法院面临关键考验
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周四将对唐纳德-特朗普总统征收关税的权力进行审查，此前一家下级法院称他对进口商品全面征税的做法超越了其权限。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Thursday will review President Donald Trump's power to impose tariffs, after a lower court said he exceeded his authority with sweeping levies on imported goods.】
